credit_line: Gift of Marcia and William Goodman
title: Tile
description: Coarse white earthenware body with press-molded design of single tulip and leaves.  Mat glazes in dark red and light green, with butterscotch mat glaze on blossom.  The tulip lossom is divided symetrically by thin walls of clay, the raised contours partitioning the inlaid glazes.  Palette is naturalistic with "Grueby green" between the leaves and the background.
name: Tile
